data.title: Grotta Azzurra Restaurant
data.text:
Private Events

Looking for a unique place to host your next event and impress your guests?

Grotta Azzurra the authentic Italian Restaurant, located in Little Italy is your perfect event space. Whether celebrating your 50th wedding anniversary or a lucrative business deal, entertaining out-of-town clients with an upscale reception, or plan a wedding rehearsal dinner, corporate event, business lunch/dinner or any other special occasion that demands an excellent meal and hospitality, Grotta Azzurra Restaurant offers the perfect setting for your event.

Grotta Azzurra offers versatile accommodations and a wide selection of menu choices for any size gathering. We can accommodate private parties of almost any size in our restaurant. Our warm and welcoming Wine Cellar Room creates a casual atmosphere, while our staff delivers the best of food, drink and Italian hospitality for your seated event for up to 60 guests or your standing events for up to 90 guests. Our Main Dining Room could be available for even bigger parties. Whether you decide on a formal, plated dinner or a casual buffet, our menus are available at a wide range of prices. We will work with you to create a custom selection for your occasion, and design a special menu for your group to fit in any budget.

Contact Grotta's Manangement by e-mail at Contact@BlueGrotta.com or call 212-925-8775,, or use the Party Planner Form below.

If you have trouble with this online form, please contact us using the email or phone number listed above.
